title: Feature: Steps could use regular dictionaries for Hyperparams / HyperparamsSpace

labels.name: wontfix
labels.description: This will not be worked on

body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
BaseTransformers instances implement _HasHyperparameters and  _HasHyperparameterSpace, both of which assign a RecursiveDict to respectively self.hyperparameters and self.hyperparameter_space. But, since every step is responsible for keeping its own hp / hp space, I believe we do not need to have RecursiveDict instance at this point.

Just to make it clear, HyperparameterSamples / HyperparameterSpace still are relevant classes even with the suggested change and I'm I no way suggesting to remove them. They are crucial to the set/update/get mechanisms defined by _HasHyperparameter and  _HasHyperparameterSpace

**Describe the solution you'd like**
Removing the casting to HyperparameterSamples / HyperparameterSpace when setting self.hyperparameters / self.hyperparameter_space in _HasHyperparameters and  _HasHyperparameterSpace 's init/set/update methods. 

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
We could keep it as it is now. Since the modifications of #435, hp handling doesn't cost all that much in term of execution time. This is clearly a low-priority change.
